text: Get all your materials ready. Sort all materials/ ingredients. Add 5 tablespoons of flour into the small bowl. The more flour added, the bigger the dough becomes. Add the salt. Don't add too much. Pour in the water. You may lessen or add more if necessary; add gradually and adjust as needed. Stir a little bit. Stop stirring if the ingredients are starting to come together. Add a little bit of oil at a time, after stirring the dough. Continue stirring the clay dough until it all comes together. Place the clay dough on the plastic tray. Knead the dough on the plastic tray for about 5 to 10 minutes, or until smooth. It should have the consistency of cold porcelain. Using your towel, wipe up any areas where you made a mess.  Keep your clay dough in an airtight container. This prevents it from drying out when not in use. Clean the materials you used. Keep them. You're now done––enjoy!
